description: A classic hearty Italian dish. This spaghetti bolognese is a welcome staple to every dinner table.
name: Hearty Spaghetti Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the onions, leek, carrot and garlic.
Add the oil to a pan on medium to high heat.
Add the mince to the pan and break up and spread evenly for 15 minutes.
Once the mince has change colour to brown and the fat has evaporated, add the vegetables and herbs.
Continue to fry for a further 5 minutes, use water to loosen up ingredients as needed.
Add the passata to the pan also with the mix and turn to a low heat for 10-15 minutes stirring constantly.
Add the pasta to another pan of boiling salted water and ensure all pasta eventually is under water for 8-10 minutes.
Once the pasta is soft, remove from pans and serve with the bolognese.
